question: Name two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy.
asked_question_translated: Navedite dve starodavni okro탑ji v Materi v Italiji, ki ju lo훾uje reka Gravina.
answer: Dve starodavni okro탑ji v Materi v Italiji, ki ju lo훾uje reka Gravina, sta Sasso Caveoso in Sasso Barisano.
answer_translated_eng: Two ancient districts in Matera, Italy, separated by the River Gravina, are Sasso Caveoso and Sasso Barisano.
